TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimePicker extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件用来让用户选择日期和时间并以指定的格式显示此日期和时间。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that allows the user to select a date and a time and to display the date and time with a specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件用于允许用户选择日期和时间，并将显示该日期和时间在指定的格式。The control is used to allow the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in the specified format. 控制可以轻松地处理日期和时间，因为它自动处理大量的数据验证。The control makes it easy to work with dates and times because it handles a lot of the data validation automatically. > [!NOTE] > 控件仅支持公历日历。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. 在用来表示日期，控件出现在两个部分： 在文本和单击列表旁的向下箭头时出现的日历表示日期的下拉列表。When used to represent a date, the control appears in two parts: a drop-down list with a date represented in text, and a calendar that appears when you click the down-arrow next to the list. 日历如下所示控件，可用于选择多个日期。The calendar looks like the control, which can be used for selecting multiple dates. 有关详细信息控制，请参阅[MonthCalendar 控件概述](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information about the control, see [MonthCalendar Control Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md). 你可以通过设置更改控件的日历部分的查找范围， ， ， ， ，和属性。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. 若要使用数值调节钮控件 （也称为 up-down 控件） 调整日期/时间值，设置属性`true`。To use a spin button control (also known as an up-down control) to adjust the date/time value, set the property to `true`. 选择控件时，将不下拉日历。The calendar will not drop down when the control is selected. 可以通过单独选择每个元素，并使用向上和向下按钮更改的值进行调整的日期和时间。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 属性包含的当前日期和时间控件设置为。The property contains the current date and time the control is set to. 你可以使用属性或将相应的成员的若要获取的日期和时间值。You can use the property or the appropriate member of to get the date and time value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 设置和使用 Windows 窗体 DateTimePicker 控件返回日期](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Set and Return Dates with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md). 你可以限制日期和时间，可以通过设置选择和属性。You can limit the dates and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 值可以显示在四种格式，通过设置属性： ， ， ，或。The values can be displayed in four formats, which are set by the property: , , , or . 默认日期是。The default date is . 如果你想若要显示为选取或编辑而不是日期时间的控件，将设置属性`true`和属性。If you want the to appear as a control for picking or editing times instead of dates, set the property to `true` and the property to . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 DateTimePicker 控件显示时间](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display Time with the DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md). 如果属性设置为，你可以通过设置创建你自己的格式样式属性并生成一个自定义格式字符串。If the property is set to , you can create your own format style by setting the property and building a custom format string. 自定义格式字符串可以是自定义字段字符和其他文本字符的组合。The custom format string can be a combination of custom field characters and other literal characters. 例如，你可以通过设置显示作为"年 6 月 01，2012年-星期五"日期属性设置为"MMMM dd，yyyy-dddd"。For example, you can display the date as "June 01, 2012 - Friday" by setting the property to "MMMM dd, yyyy - dddd". 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DateTimePicker 控件以自定义格式显示日期](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display a Date in a Custom Format with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!CAUTION] > 当是数据绑定和支持值更改为`null`的值将不会更新，将保留以前的值。When a is data-bound and the backing value is changed to `null`, the value of the will not be updated and the previous value will be retained. 在其中此行为是不需要 （例如，当使用一组数据绑定控件，逐页浏览记录集） 的情况下使用事件类来设置为识别为值`null`。In situations where this behavior is not desirable (for example, when using a set of data-bound controls to page through a recordset) use the event of the class to set the to a value recognizable as a `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的新实例控件，并对其进行初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 控件的属性设置。The control's property is set. 此外，属性设置，以便该控件将显示，和以便控件将显示为数值调节钮控件设置属性。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体并调用`CreateMyDateTimePicker`示例窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `CreateMyDateTimePicker` method in the example form’s constructor or event handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置应用于日历的字体样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the font style applied to the calendar.

value.span: 表示应用于日历的字体样式的 。

span.span: A that represents the font style applied to the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启动与 Windows Vista 和具体取决于主题，设置此属性可能不更改的外观的日历。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，设置此属性无效。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为日历的更新的版本呈现在运行时派生自当前的操作系统主题的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果你想要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，你可以为你的应用程序禁用视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响的外观和应用程序中其他控件的行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用在 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，打开项目设计器，并取消选中**启用 XP 视觉样式**复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要禁用在 C# 中的视觉样式，打开 Program.cs，并注释掉`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize the property. 此示例创建一个新控件中，将其添加到集合，然后初始化属性设置为动态定义。This example creates a new control, adds it to the collection of a , and then initializes the property to a dynamically defined . [!code-cpp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CPP/calendarfont.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CS/calendarfont.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/VB/calendarfont.vb#1)]

span.span: A string that represents the custom date/time format.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到包含日期和时间分隔符的显示字符串文本或格式字符串，你必须在子字符串内使用转义字符。To display string literals that contain date and time separators or to format strings, you must use escape characters in the substring. 例如，若要显示作为"6 月 15 日下午 12:00"的日期，设置属性设置为"MMMM dd at t:mm tt"。For example, to display the date as "June 15 at 12:00 PM", set the property to "MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt". 如果"at"的子字符串不包含转义字符，则结果是"6 月 15 日 aP 12:00 PM"由于"t"字符读取为一个字母 a.m./p.m.。If the "at" substring is not enclosed by escape characters, the result is "June 15 aP 12:00PM" because the "t" character is read as the one-letter A.M./P.M. 格式字符串 （请参阅下面的格式字符串表）。format string (see the format string table below). 若要设置格式的日期和时间，可以组合的格式字符串。The format strings can be combined to format the date and time. 例如，若要显示的日期和时间为 2001-06-15 12:00 PM，此属性应设置为"MM '/' dd '/' yyyy hh': ' mm tt"。For example, to display the date and time as 06/15/2001 12:00 PM, this property should be set to "MM'/'dd'/'yyyy hh':'mm tt". 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为，此属性才会影响显示的日期和时间格式设置。The property must be set to for this property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time. 下表列出了所有有效的格式字符串及其说明。The following table lists all the valid format strings and their descriptions. |格式字符串Format string|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |dd|一个或两位数的日期。The one- or two-digit day.| |dddd|两位数的日期。The two-digit day. 由 0 前面带有位数字的日期值。Single-digit day values are preceded by a 0.| |dddddd|三个字符一天的一周缩写。The three-character day-of-week abbreviation.| |dddddddd|完整的星期名称中。The full day-of-week name.| |hh|一个或两位数小时采用 12 小时格式。The one- or two-digit hour in 12-hour format.| |hhhh|两位数小时采用 12 小时格式。The two-digit hour in 12-hour format. 由 0 前面带有单个数字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |HH|一个或两位数小时采用 24 小时格式。The one- or two-digit hour in 24-hour format.| |HHHH|两位数小时采用 24 小时格式。The two-digit hour in 24-hour format. 由 0 前面带有单个数字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |mm|一个或两个数字的分钟数。The one- or two-digit minute.| |mmmm|两个数字的分钟数。The two-digit minute. 由 0 前面带有单个数字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MM|一个或两位数月份值。The one- or two-digit month number.| |MMMM|两位数月份数。The two-digit month number. 由 0 前面带有单个数字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MMMMMM|三个字符的月份的缩写。The three-character month abbreviation.| |MMMMMMMM|完整的月份名称中。The full month name.| |秒s|一个或两位数秒。The one- or two-digit seconds.| |ssss|两位数秒数。The two-digit seconds. 由 0 前面带有单个数字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |tt|一个字母 a.m./p.m.。The one-letter A.M./P.M. 缩写 (A.M.abbreviation (A.M. 显示为"A"）。is displayed as "A").| |tttt|两个字母 a.m./p.m.。The two-letter A.M./P.M. 缩写 (A.M.abbreviation (A.M. 将显示为"AM"）。is displayed as "AM").| |yy|一位数的年份 （2001年显示为"1"）。The one-digit year (2001 is displayed as "1").| |yyyy|年份 （2001年显示为"01"） 最后两个数字。The last two digits of the year (2001 is displayed as "01").| |yyyyyyyy|完整年份 （2001年显示为"2001"）。The full year (2001 is displayed as "2001").| ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性以便将显示为"年 6 月 01，2001年-星期五"日期。The following code example sets the property so that the will display the date as "June 01, 2001 - Friday". 此代码假定的实例上已创建控件。This code assumes that an instance of a control has been created on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的字符串等效于与合适的格式设置或应用自定义格式设置的属性。The string returned by this property is equivalent to the property with the appropriate formatting or custom formatting applied. 例如，如果属性设置为 2001-06-01 12:00:00 AM 时属性设置为"dddd，MMMM dd，yyyy"属性值是"星期五，01，2001 年 6 月"。For example, if the property is set to 06/01/2001 12:00:00 AM while the property is set to "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy", the property value is "Friday, June 01, 2001". 设置此属性时，字符串必须可转换为实例类。When setting this property, the string must be convertible to an instance of the class. 可以定义导致无法转换为有效的字符串的自定义格式值。It is possible to define a custom format that results in a string that cannot be converted to a valid value. 因此，从返回的字符串属性可能会导致错误，如果它被传递回属性。Because of this, the string returned from the property might cause an error if it is passed back to the property. 如果字符串无法转换为日期/时间值，类将引发。If the string cannot be converted to a date/time value, the class throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件之前验证用户输入。User input is validated before this event is raised. 输入的日期早于时不引发此事件或晚于。This event is not raised when the entered date is earlier than or later than . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DateTimePicker1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DateTimePicker1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
